articles.description: Sam Lee built a studio in a wood, found a nightingale to sing with, hooked up a backing band, and livestreamed their concerts. But it is a race against time – for the song of the nightingale may soon be lost for ever
articles.content: Building your artistic life around duetting with a rare bird that only sings at night for six weeks each year might seem a quixotic quest. But for Sam Lee, folk singer, song collector and environment… [+8932 chars]

articles.title: Laura Sharrad says she’s feeling ‘unsafe’ after receiving a ‘disturbing’ Instagram message - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Laura Sharrad says she’s feeling ‘unsafe’ after receiving a ‘disturbing’ Instagram message
articles.content: MasterChef star Laura Sharrad has called out a disturbing message she was sent on Instagram, sharing that it left her feeling sick and violated.While the MasterChef: All Stars runner-up didn’t reveal… [+1913 chars]

articles.author: Jason Om
articles.title: Kamahl responds to Daryl Somers's regret over Hey Hey It's Saturday treatment - ABC News
articles.description: The much-loved Malaysian-born entertainer recently opened up about the hurt and humiliation he experienced while appearing on Hey Hey It's Saturday.
articles.content:
Much-loved entertainer Kamahl has accepted the "deep regret" expressed by the makers of Hey Hey It's Saturday over the repeated racist jokes he faced on the popular variety program.
